TFTPListRec
Hierarchy     methods     

Unit
FTPsend

Description
Object for holding file information parsed from directory listing of FTP server.

It conatins this fields:

FileName: string
...name of file

Directory: Boolean
...if name is subdirectory or file.

Readable: Boolean
...if you have rights for read

FileSize: Longint
...size of file

FileTime: TDateTime
...date and time of file. Local server timezone is used. Any timezone conversions is not done!


See also:
TFTPList.List, TFTPList.ParseLine
